eclipse.buildId=I200406251208
java.version=1.4.2_05
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US

Happens frequently after hot code replace.
Debug Model gets out of sync and reports suspended
threads and running and vice versa.

Full log attached.

Created an attachment (id=13771)
complete log. Eclipse 3.0 installed from the net. There are other nasty things
in this log file
I am running XP HyperThreaded - if it matters.

Fixed in 3.0.1 branch. Similar to bug 70993, but with different timing (i.e. 
we detect that the thread has resumed at a different place in the code). Fix 
is in JDIStackFrame.supportsDropToFrame(), and avoids logging exception.

traces.message: Unable to retrieve stack frame - thread  not suspended.
